me.kevingleason.pnwebrtc

Class PnRTCListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.kevingleason.pnwebrtc.PnRTCListener

  • public abstract class PnRTCListener
extends java.lang.Object
    Todo: Think about parameters.

    Callback listener for various WebRTC and PeerConnection.Observer events.

     Author:  Kevin Gleason - Boston College '16
 File:    PnRTCListener.java
 Date:    7/20/15
 Use:     Callback listener for various WebRTC events
 © 2009 - 2015 PubNub, Inc.

    About this class:

    Implement this interface to be notified of WebRTC events. It is an abstract class with default behaviors of doing nothing. Use a PnRTCListener to implement the various callbacks of your WebRTC application.

      • onCallReady

        public void onCallReady(java.lang.String callId)

      • onConnected

        public void onConnected(java.lang.String userId)
        Called in Pubnub object's subscribe connected callback. Means that you are ready to receive calls.
        Parameters:
        userId - The channel you are subscribed to, the userId you may be called on.

      • onPeerStatusChanged

        public void onPeerStatusChanged(PnPeer peer)
        Peer status changed. PnPeer status changed, can be CONNECTING, CONNECTED, or DISCONNECTED.
        Parameters:
        peer - The peer object, can use to check peer.getStatus()

      • onPeerConnectionClosed

        public void onPeerConnectionClosed(PnPeer peer)
        TODO: Is this different than onPeerStatusChanged == DISCONNECTED? Called when a hangup occurs.
        Parameters:
        peer - The peer who was hung up on, or who hung up on you

      • onLocalStream

        public void onLocalStream(org.webrtc.MediaStream localStream)
        Called in PnPeerConnectionClient when setLocalStream is invoked.
        Parameters:
        localStream - The users local stream from Android's front or back camera.

      • onAddRemoteStream

        public void onAddRemoteStream(org.webrtc.MediaStream remoteStream,
                              PnPeer peer)
        Called when a remote stream is added in the PeerConnection.Observer in PnPeer.
        Parameters:
        remoteStream - The remote stream that was added
        peer - The peer that added the remote stream Todo: Maybe not the right peer?

      • onRemoveRemoteStream

        public void onRemoveRemoteStream(org.webrtc.MediaStream remoteStream,
                                 PnPeer peer)
        Called in the PeerConnection.Observer implemented by PnPeer.
        Parameters:
        remoteStream - The stream that was removed by your peer
        peer - The peer that removed the stream.

      • onMessage

        public void onMessage(PnPeer peer,
                      java.lang.Object message)
        Called when a user message is send via Pubnub object.
        Parameters:
        peer - The peer who sent the message
        message - The JSONObject message sent by the user.

      • onDebug

        public void onDebug(PnRTCMessage message)
        A helpful debugging callback for testing and developing your app.
        Parameters:
        message - The PnRTCMessage debug message.
